div.a: STEM / Project Lead the Way / Carl Perkins

b.i: Distance Learning began on Monday, April 6

font.i: Visit our new BPSLEARN.COM site for that program and COVID-19 information

li.font: All packets through May 21 are now available to download at BPSLEARN.COM. That website also has a link to phone-friendly copies of the same lessons for each grade level by date and by subject.

b.font: Middle school & high school online learning:

li.font: Go to BPSLEARN.COM for links to Canvas and other services.
